name: LivinupRV
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen ceiling light.”
”Alexa, turn on lounge reading light.”
”Alexa, turn on step light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa for control your caravan lighting such as kitchen reading light, lounge ceiling light, awning light...etc. When you sleepy, just ask Alexa to enable SLEEP Mode. you won't standup to find wall switch. just ask Alexa!

The skill need to work with Livinup 12 channel controller. and support 12 lighting control command and two scenes.

1. Kitchen ceiling light
2. Kitchen reading light 
3. Lounge Ceiling light
4. Lounge reading light
5. Bedroom Ceiling light
6. Bedroom Reading light
7. Front door Light 
8. Awning light 
9. Step light 
10. Dining ceiling light 
11. Bathroom light 
12. Shower light.

1. Sleep Mode
2. Romantic Mode
